AI Description: Strique is a software tool designed for computational biology and bioinformatics applications. It focuses on analyzing and visualizing RNA sequence and secondary structure data, with a specific emphasis on RNA structural motifs and their biological functions.
Core Features: 1. Analyzing RNA sequences and secondary structures. 2. Identifying and characterizing RNA structural motifs. 3. Visualizing RNA structures and motifs. 4. Investigating the biological relevance of RNA motifs.
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, RNA Analysis, Structural Motifs
